title: Why is Kayn so weak?
body:
I watched his trailer and he looked so strong and now he's absolute trash. WHere is his spike? Because he gets hammered early, mid, and late game.

I mean, he provides nothing and has a very little reward.

Almost 90% of the roster can 100/0 an out of position ADC.

i don't think hes too weak, in my opinion, as i have been playing him quite a bit and prefer assassin form over darkin anyday, he does lack spike compared to other assassins like talon and zed, but the damage is there if played right and built right, he works well atm with a crit build with static on, most squishy with that build go down pretty much by time your combo is done, have gone a bruiser build on him as the darkin and that works well too, the only thing i have noticed really is if he gets behind he does cop it pretty hard compared to other champs.

But these are all from my own experiences playing him, the one irk i got is he still takes damage with dots when he ults on to someone but thats really it, otherwise yer, fun champ and i see more assassin's then the darkins might be the time im playing haha.
He's getting a buff next patch, mainly to his assassin form since everyone usually just ends up taking the darkin form.

He was strong in his trailer because he was so many levels ahead and already fed (obviously to hype up the champion). But also because you might not know how to play the champion (i.e. Ryze might seem weak at first, but he's very good in the hands of someone who knows how to play him).
